tool.name: Peak predictor
tool.description: - generates peak predictions from an index file

param.name: method
param.label: Smoothing method
param.help: The function used to average nearby read values

param.name: sigma
param.label: Smoothing factor
param.help: The interval over which each read is averaged

param.name: level
param.label: Threshold
param.help: Return only peaks above this value

param.name: strand
param.label: Strands
param.help: Combine strand data or predict on each strand separately

tool.help:
**Help**
This tool will generate genome wide peak prediction from an index file.
**Parameters**
- **Smoothing method** the function used to average nearby values
- **Smoothing value** the factor used in the method
- **Prediction method** the function used to average nearby values
